cards.name: Vesuvan Shapeshifter
cards.originalText:
于维苏瓦变形兽进场或翻回正面时，你可以选择场上的另一个生物。 若你如此作，则直到维苏瓦变形兽翻为牌面朝下为止，它成为该生物的复制，且获得「在你的维持开始时，你可以将此生物翻为牌面朝下。」
变身{1}{U}
cards.text:
As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down."
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Viscerid Deepwalker
cards.originalText:
{U}：维塞里深潜兵得+1/+0直到回合结束。
延缓4～{U}（除了从你手上使用此牌，你可以支付{U}并将此牌移出对战，且上面有四个计时指示物。 在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。 当你移去最后一个时，则使用它且不需支付其法术力费用。 它具有敏捷。）
cards.text:
{U}: Viscerid Deepwalker gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Suspend 4—{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Voidmage Husher
cards.originalText:
闪现（你可以于你能够使用瞬间的时机下使用此咒语。）
当销法师静音使进场时，反击目标起动式异能。 （其目标不能是法术力异能）
每当你使用咒语时，你可以将销法师静音使移回其拥有者手上。
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Voidmage Husher enters the battlefield, counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Whenever you cast a spell, you may return Voidmage Husher to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Walk the Aeons
cards.originalText:
购回～牺牲三个海岛。 （你使用此咒语时可以额外牺牲三个海岛并支付任何其它费用。 若你如此做，则结算此咒语时将它放入你的手牌。）
目标牌手在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。
cards.text:
Buyback—Sacrifice three Islands. (You may sacrifice three Islands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

cards.flavor: 这树身怪兽一眨眼便没了踪影，只留下在那片刻的轻风。
cards.name: Wipe Away

将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: 在过去的多明纳里亚，各地统治者都会聘雇刺客。 不过，这些顶级杀手只对自己的同路人完全效忠。 即使旧王朝覆亡，这精英团体依旧安然无恙。
cards.name: Assassinate
cards.originalText: 消灭目标已横置的生物。
cards.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

cards.flavor:
「真了不起. . . 这些生物展现了生存韧性与自毁意图的吊诡结合，正是我为索尔兽育种所要达成的目标。」
～培育师恩德瑞克·萨尔
